page.title: 19SERVICES IN NAILSTONE
page.content:
As there is only one shop in the village, several vans provide useful services.
The{milk van}delivers milk from Monday to Saturday. The{green grocer's}van sells eggs, tomatoes, carrots, and cabbage. The{wet fish}van sells trout and prawns. The{library}van comes on Fridays. The blue{fish and chip}van comes on Tuesday and Friday evenings. It also sells beans, curry, pies and sausages. The driver sounds his horn so that people will know he is ready to sell his fish and chips.
There is no{doctor}or{dentist}in the village, people travel to Ibstock or Coalville for medical services.
